insert into data_element_collectorg (id, data_element_id, data_element_collect_org_code, data_element_collect_org_name, create_date, create_user_id, modify_date, modify_user_id) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementCollectOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataElementCollectOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete:
delete from data_element_collectorg where id in
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT data_element_collect_org_code AS orgCode, data_element_collect_org_name AS orgName, dept_code_or_area_code AS regionCode FROM data_element_collectorg WHERE data_element_id = #{dataElementId}
